channel.title: Logging into IRC
channel.description:
How fucking hard is it to remember your password!
[01:03:15 00:20:46] <<@NickServ>> DeathsChaos9 () failed IDENTIFY to deathschaos9 (bad password) [01:03:15 00:22:44] <<@NickServ>> deathschaos9 () failed IDENTIFY to deathschaos9 (bad password) [01:03:15 00:22:48] <<@NickServ>> deathschaos9 IDENTIFY
[01:03:15 09:09:30] <<@NickServ>> antiyou () failed IDENTIFY to antiyou (bad password) [01:03:15 09:09:30] <<@NickServ>> antiyou IDENTIFY
[01:03:15 18:45:15] <<@NickServ>> DeathsChaos9 () failed IDENTIFY to deathschaos9 (bad password)
[01:03:15 21:53:26] <<@NickServ>> antiyou () failed IDENTIFY to antiyou (bad password) [01:03:15 21:53:27] <<@NickServ>> antiyou IDENTIFY
[01:03:15 22:34:03] <<@NickServ>> DeathsChaos9 () failed IDENTIFY to deathschaos9 (bad password) [01:03:15 22:36:56] <<@SaslServ>> deathschaos9:558AAAKT4 LOGIN (session timed out)
They created auto login for a reason. Use it nerds.

item.title: Logging into IRC
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“antiyou, post:6, topic:548939”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=667848.msg4466430#msg4466430 date=1420402955]
Sure it’s the servers fault.
[/quote]

It is. Plus you are an IRC noob so gtfo.

P.S. I fixed the problem just for you. It was reading my bnc server login info.[/quote]

Thanks Buddy.

Read full topic

item.title: Logging into IRC
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

since we’re talking about irc id like to report a hack attempt by the user lawl and or someone impersonating as him

[NickServ] []!lawl@ip.ip.ip.ip failed to login to drubrkletern. There has been 1 failed login attempt since your last successful login. [NickServ] [}!lawl@ip.ip.ip.ip failed to login to drubrkletern. There have been 2 failed login attempts since your last successful login.
pelase ban

Read full topic

item.title: Logging into IRC
item.dc:creator: @antiyou antiyou
item.description:
@antiyou wrote:

Jmood:

Sure it’s the servers fault.

It is. Plus you are an IRC noob so gtfo.

P.S. I fixed the problem just for you. It was reading my bnc server login info.

@doom_j wrote:

Sure it’s the servers fault.

item.title: Logging into IRC
item.dc:creator: @antiyou antiyou
item.description:
@antiyou wrote:

Actually I do have my password on autologin, it’s just that exemplars server is shit.

-NickServ- This nickname is registered. Please choose a different nickname, or identify via /msg NickServ identify <password>.
-NickServ- You have 15 seconds to identify to your nickname before it is changed.
-NickServ- Invalid password for antiyou.
-NickServ- You are now identified for antiyou.
-NickServ- 1 failed login since last login.
-NickServ- Last failed attempt from: antiyou!antiyou@users-aq4.2pe.hldkos.IP on Jan 04 14:03:23 2015.
* antiyou!antiyou@users-aq4.2pe.hldkos.IP antiyou :You are now logged in as antiyou

I don’t even know why.

Read full topic

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

How hard is it not to leak #opers to non staff

You mean #services right? l2oper noob.
